column4: on my amd64 the flash player has stopped working :( firefox says it hasn't the plugin :( I have re-configured the "flashplugin-installer" package but this hasn't helped. Can anyone help?
Go to synaptic and uninstall flash plugin and installer
go to your .mozilla and make a folder called "plugins"
extract the .so file and drag it or copy and paste it into that plugins folder you made
its going now... I wonder why it didn't work when I did a dpkg-reconfigure on the same package.
extract the file than drag it to the plugins folder you made
